titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3674) to provide for congressional approval of the Governing International Fishery Agreement between the United States and Japan.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-487.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 266 - 130 (Record Vote No: 497).

bill.summary: 12/17/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3674 (U.S.-Japan fishery agreement).
